modName: Konungr Keep-The Keep Of Kings BETA
summary:
My first mod revised! A sprawling player owned Keep currently in BETA not quite done yet. Ill be adding 30+ NPC\'s to make it seem more lively. 
More like a small village disgued as a Keep!
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b152/ByeByeBeautifulT/Cover.jpg[/IMG]

Name: Konungr Keep
Version: BETA
Date: 5/9/2012
Category: Castles, Palaces, Mansions, Estates 
Author: XTurkX

MOD ON A HIATUS


Built long ago by ancient dwemer architects. Though none know its orgin the inhabitants belive the keep was held by Yagrasmor in a key battle against ancheint elves.
They belive it was here where he staged his counter attack eventually leading to him becoming the first high king of Skyrim. In light of the civil war
The inhabitants patiently guard the keep to award to the next Dovahkiin who can once again crown a new high king and reunite skyrim!


Description
===========

My first mod revised! A sprawling player owned Keep currently in BETA not quite done yet. Ill be adding 30+ NPC\'s to make it seem more lively. 
More like a small village disguised as a Keep!


Location
========
Konungr Keep is located just outside of Whiterun. Check your map. Its down the road from the Horningbrew Meadery.




Details
=======
keep in mind this is a BETA version. Ill be shelfing the project untill i can find a team to help me bring this mod to fruition.
There will be bugs, things that look out of place and there are also a few missing areas i have yet to add. 
The keep is usuable and has everything a Dovah could need though!

GRAND HALL
[IMG]http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b152/ByeByeBeautifulT/GrandHall.jpg[/IMG]
Acts as a hub to the overkeep. Houses The council room

LIBRARY
[IMG]http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b152/ByeByeBeautifulT/Library.jpg[/IMG]
Here you can store all your books. In future updates ill be adding a librarian who sells books!

CHAPEL OF KINGS
[IMG]http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b152/ByeByeBeautifulT/ChapelOfKings.jpg[/IMG]
Houses every shrine except Talos due to the white gold concordat. Although you hear a strange humming underneath the bedroom of the chapel...

Military COMPOUND
[IMG]http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b152/ByeByeBeautifulT/MilitaryCompound.jpg[/IMG]
Youll find this in the underkeep. Also houses the War room and the training grounds.

MESS HALL
[IMG]http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b152/ByeByeBeautifulT/MessHall.jpg[/IMG]
Here youll find your kitchen and dining hall, along with a cellar where you can store your food!

UNDERKEEP
[IMG]http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b152/ByeByeBeautifulT/Underkeep.jpg[/IMG]
An ancient Dwarven castle. The over-keep was built on top of it. Acts as a hub.

DORMITORIES
[IMG]http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b152/ByeByeBeautifulT/Dormitories.jpg[/IMG]
Houses the bedrooms for the npcs that will inhabit the keep. Also houses a bathhouse!

KINGS QUARTERS
[IMG]http://i19.photobucket.com/albums/b152/ByeByeBeautifulT/KingsQaurters.jpg[/IMG]
Your personal bedroom! Youll find a kitchen and bathroom here also!









Install
======
1. Use NMM to install. 
2. Manually install contents of archive in Skyrim/Data folder.







Incompatibility
===============
None that i know of. If you find any please PM me.






Bugs
===============
- Sometimes there is a LOD issue with the outside of the keep. If you experience this go inside the keep save your game, quit Skyrim and reload your game.

- There are minor texture clashing issues ill fix in future updates

- Sometimes items will randomly fall out of place, including food. Ive tried to fix it before this release but i cant figure it out
  In the full release ill be sure to have that bug fixed.

-Thanks to mortias for pointing out this bug: Be careful where you walk in the chapel, i must have put a non static candle holder so if you bump into it its knocked down and cant be fixed, not game breaking but immersion breaking. Ill keep this one in mind for future updates.

- If there are any other bugs while your trying out the mod please let me know so i can fix them!!







Future Updates
===============
-Fishery and player owned ship
-Alchemy and enchanting room in the Dormitories
-Graveyard and Gravekeeper
-Mines with every kind of ore connected to the keep
-30+ Npc\'s, Merchants, Followers, trainers, companions with dynamic scheduals.
-Heavily scripted events
-10 or so quests with unique rewards 

CREDITS!
XTurkX

And a special thanks to these authors for the excellent modders resources they provide on the nexus!

Oaristys
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16525

 Blary
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14134#content
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14136
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14133

Eldiabs
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11618
